column4: Tourism;Siem Reap:------ According a notice released
column5: elephants are gradually being taken from  Angkor Park in accordance with a ------directive to ban elephant ------tours which comes into effect in 2020.------On November 14
column7: some animals were taken from the park to a community forest in Siem Reap province’s Suth Nikom district
column9: but under close care and supervision.------ TVFB
